subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: John Velazquez was hospitalized after a spill at Keeneland that also injured his fellow jockey Jamie Theriot. Velazquez was sent to the University of Kentucky trauma unit for evaluation, the track said. He was alert and moving his arms and legs.
snippet: John Velazquez was hospitalized after a spill at Keeneland that also injured his fellow jockey Jamie Theriot. Velazquez was sent to the University of Kentucky trauma unit for evaluation, the track said. He was alert and moving his arms and legs.
